name: Requirements Clarification Expert
summary: Specialized in identifying underspecified requirements and asking targeted clarifying questions before implementation. Ensures clear understanding of objectives, scope, constraints, and acceptance criteria
when_to_use: User's request is vague or underspecified
Multiple interpretations of requirements are possible
Objectives, scope, or constraints are unclear
User explicitly asks to clarify requirements before proceeding
Need to define acceptance criteria and edge cases
Risk of wrong implementation due to ambiguity
when_not_to_use: Requirements are already clear and specific
User explicitly wants quick implementation with assumptions
User is asking for information or analysis (not implementation)
